flavorText: Many kami came to demand a secret he did not know, and every one of them fell.

foreignData.flavorText: Viele Kami kamen, um ein Geheimnis zu erfahren, das er nicht kannte, und jeder von ihnen fiel.
foreignData.name: Kumano konfrontiert Kakkazan // Bildnis von Kumano
foreignData.text:
Eile
Falls eine Kreatur, der in diesem Zug von einer Quelle, die du kontrolliert hast, Schaden zugefügt wurde, sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: Muchos kami fueron a exigirle un secreto que él desconocía, y ninguno regresó.
foreignData.name: Kumano contra Kakkazan // Grabado de Kumano
foreignData.text:
Prisa.
Si una criatura que recibió daño este turno de una fuente que controlas fuera a morir, en vez de eso, exíliala.

foreignData.flavorText: Nombreux furent les kami qui exigèrent de lui un secret qu'il n'avait pas, et tous mordirent la poussière.
foreignData.name: Kumano affronte Kakkazan // Gravure de Kumano
foreignData.text:
Célérité
Si une créature blessée ce tour-ci par une source que vous contrôliez devait mourir, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: Molti kami si presentarono in cerca di un segreto che lui non conosceva e ognuno di loro cadde.
foreignData.name: Kumano Affronta Akkazan // Incisione di Kumano
foreignData.text:
Rapidità
Se una creatura a cui una fonte controllata da te ha inflitto danno in questo turno sta per morire, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: 多くの神が自分の知らない秘密を求めて現れたが、そのすべてが倒された。
foreignData.name: 熊野と渇苛斬の対峙 // 熊野の食刻
foreignData.text:
速攻
このターン、あなたがコントロールしている発生源からダメージを受けたクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — 人間・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: 많은 카미가 그가 모르는 비밀을 요구하러 왔고, 그들은 하나도 남김없이 쓰러졌다.
foreignData.name: 쿠마노가 카카잔과 맞서다 // 쿠마노의 동판화
foreignData.text:
신속
당신이 조종하는 원천에 피해를 입은 생물이 이 턴에 죽으려 한다면, 대신 그 생물을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Muitos kami o procuraram exigindo que revelasse um segredo que ele não conhecia, e todos eles pereceram.
foreignData.name: Kumano Enfrenta Kakkazan // Gravura de Kumano
foreignData.text:
Ímpeto
Se uma criatura que sofreu dano de uma fonte que você controlava neste turno morreria, em vez disso, exile-a.

foreignData.flavorText: Многие ками приходили к нему, чтобы выведать секрет, которого не знал он сам. Каждый из них пал.
foreignData.name: Кумано Встречается с Каккадзан // Гравировка Кумано
foreignData.text:
Ускорение
Если существо, которому в этом ходу были нанесены повреждения от источника под вашим контролем, должно умереть, изгоните его вместо этого.

foreignData.flavorText: 许多神明前来求索熊野自己也不知道的秘密，然而全都无功而返。
foreignData.name: 熊野大战渴苛斩 // 熊野蚀刻像
foreignData.text:
敏捷
如果本回合中受过由你操控之来源伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

foreignData.flavorText: 許多神明前來求索熊野自己也不知道的秘密，然而全都無功而返。
foreignData.name: 熊野大戰渴苛斬 // 熊野蝕刻像
foreignData.text:
敏捷
如果本回合中受過由你操控之來源傷害的生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。

name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan // Etching of Kumano
originalText:
Haste
If a creature dealt damage this turn by a source you controlled would die, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Each face of a transforming double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, abilities, and so on. While a transforming double-faced permanent is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored.

Each transforming double-faced card in this set is cast face up. In every zone other than the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face. If it is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's up; the other face's characteristics are ignored.
The mana value of a transforming double-faced card is the mana value of its front face, no matter which face is up.
The back face of a transforming double-faced card usually has a color indicator that defines its color.

A transforming double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed or you cast it transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.

If you are instructed to put a card that isn't a double-faced card onto the battlefield transformed, it will not enter the battlefield at all. In that case, it stays in the zone it was previously in. For example, if a single-faced card is a copy of Azusa's Many Journeys, the chapter III ability will cause it to be exiled and then remain in exile.

text:
Haste
